hints.displayPurposeOnly: Is used for display purposes only.
hints.validEmailRequired: Kindly use a valid email address. Will be used as login id.
hints.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character.
hints.confirmPasswordMatch: Confirm your password. Must match the password typed above.
hints.inviteCodeEmail: Please copy the token you would have received in your email.
hints.forgotEmailContact: If you forgot the email you used for signing up, please contact your administrator.
hints.copyTokenFromEmail: Please copy the token you received in your email.
hints.confirmNewPassword: Confirm your new password. Must match the password typed above.

validation.passwordsDoNotMatch: New Password and Confirm Password do not match.

errors.registrationErrorEnterprise: Error in registering user. Please contact your administrator. ({{message}})
errors.registrationErrorCloud: Error in registering user. Please try again.
errors.sendInstructionsFailed: Failed to send instructions, please contact your administrator.

success.registrationSuccessEnterprise: Registration Successful. You will be redirected to the sign in page shortly.
success.registrationSuccessCloud: To complete your registration, please click on the verification link we sent to your email address
success.verificationEmailSent: Verification email has been sent successfully.
success.resetInstructionsSent: Password reset instructions sent to the email.

sso.signInWithAuth0: Sign In With Auth0 by Okta
